articles.description: Several major European countries, including France, Italy and Greece, have already implemented mandatory vaccines.
articles.content:

articles.title: MIUI 12.5 lands on the EU Redmi Note 9S as Xiaomi expands rollout for the Redmi Note 9 - Notebookcheck.net

articles.content: Last week, Xiaomi started rolling out the MIUI 12.5 update to Global ROM units of the Helio G90-powered Redmi Note 9. The company is now expanding that to include other models of the phone, while als… [+876 chars]

articles.author: Tereza Pultarova
articles.title: Watch the BepiColombo probe zoom by Venus on its way to Mercury in this new video - Space.com
articles.description: The European-Japanese BepiColombo spacecraft headed to Mercury can be seen flying low above the atmosphere of Venus in a new video released by the European Space Agency (ESA) on Thursday (Aug. 12).
articles.content:
The European-Japanese BepiColombo spacecraft headed to Mercury can be seen flying low above the atmosphere of Venus
 in a new video released today (Aug. 12).

articles.title: Sicily Registers Record-High Temperature as Heat Wave Sweeps Italian Island - The New York Times
articles.description: A monitoring station on the island reported a temperature of 119.84 Fahrenheit, 48.8 degrees Celsius, on Wednesday. If verified, it would be the highest ever recorded in Europe.
